This is my report

```{r echo = FALSE}
chart <- ggplot(data = df,aes(x=time,y=Q50))+
      geom_ribbon(aes(ymin=Q10, ymax=Q90),fill = "gray70")+
      geom_line(col = "red")+
      theme(legend.position = "none",axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1))+
      ggtitle("Effect vs time (for selected stream) ")+
      ylab("Effect L/s")+
      xlab("Time days")
```
